name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
Chop cherry tomatoes and cucumber into small pieces.
In a large bowl, mix quinoa, tomatoes, and cucumber.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil, then toss well.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Grilled Chicken with Vegetables
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season chicken with salt, pepper, and minced garlic.
Slice zucchini and bell peppers into strips.
Brush vegetables with olive oil and grill alongside the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side.
Serve hot with a side of grilled vegetables.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Rinse lentils thoroughly under running water.
In a large pot, saut√© chopped carrots, celery, and garlic for 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and lentils, then pour in enough water to cover.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender.
Season to taste and serve warm.

name: Cheesy Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions and drain.
In a saucepan, melt butter over low heat, then add milk and shredded cheddar cheese.
Stir continuously until cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
Mix the cooked pasta with the cheese sauce.
Serve warm and enjoy!

name: Tofu Stir-Fry
instructions: Press tofu to remove excess moisture and cut into cubes.
Heat sesame oil in a pan and add tofu, cooking until golden brown.
Add chopped broccoli, grated ginger, and a splash of soy sauce.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until broccoli is tender-crisp.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.
